name: 5th World Nursing and Patient Healthcare
content: The Organizing Committee of 5th World Nursing and Patient Healthcare invite you to participate in the nursing congress, which will be held during April 21-22, 2025 at Lisbon, Portugal. The main theme of conference is “Nurses Together For Global Health Advancements”. This Conference will provide a unique opportunity for nurses, healthcare practitioners, paramedics, and trauma care specialists worldwide to communicate and share innovative thoughts and practices designed to optimize patient care.
